name: Backpack
description: Upgrade your storage to carry more items.

name: Banner Color: Black
description: Switch your banner to the black Malta variant.

name: Banner Color: Red
description: Switch your banner to the red Malta variant.

name: Trail Cooldown Reset
description: Reset the cooldown on your currently equipped trail.

name: Pet Rename Token
description: Allows you to rename one of your pets.

name: Deloomer Token
description: Remove 1 loom from an upgraded item and return it to your inventory. One use only.
